ISSUE.TITLE: Affiliate details page. Remove "Affiliate identifier" field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Anyway it's not useful anymore (we have "Affiliate URL" field)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #1879 Do not allow system names (e.g. "con", "com1", "lpt1", etc) in "Search engine-friendly URL" fields. Anyway they will cause a runtime error.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1863 Affiliate details page. Removed "Affiliate identifier" field
